message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product for $18,000. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love.
That's a bit too high for my budget.  Would you consider $12,000?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12,000. I can meet you in the middle at $16,000.
I appreciate you meeting me a bit. How about $14,000?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go all the way to $14,000. I can do $15,000, which is my minimum, but I'm not sure if I can go any lower.
